name: Chengdu - 成都
description: Chengdu is the capital of Sichuan province in Southwest China. It is known for its spicy cuisine, giant pandas, and historic sites.

name: Chongqing - 重庆
description: Chongqing is a major city in Southwest China. It is known for its hotpot cuisine, scenic views of the Yangtze River, and historic sites.

name: Zhangjiajie - 张家界
description: Zhangjiajie is a city in Hunan province in Central China. It is known for its stunning natural scenery, including the Zhangjiajie National Forest Park and the Tianmen Mountain.
